sentences.en: A serious attempt at interstellar communication would be very expensive.
sentences.cn: 作一次星际通信的认真尝试可能很费钱.

sentences.en: Asteroid has become commonplace to the readers of interstellar travel stories in science fiction magazines.
sentences.cn: 对于读过科幻杂志中星际旅行故事的读者来说,小行星已是平淡无味了.

sentences.en: Astronomers usually assume that interstellar dust is closely confined to the galactic plane.
sentences.cn: 天文学家通常认为,恒星际星尘都是紧靠着银河平面的.

sentences.en: Collapsing interstellar cloud reverses its gravitational infall and expands outward into the relatively quiescent interstellar environment.
sentences.cn: 坍缩的星际云克服向内的引力而向外膨胀到较宁静的星际环境中去.

sentences.en: Fluorescent destruction occurs about once for every ten interstellar ultraviolet photons absorbed.
sentences.cn: 每吸收十个星际紫外光子,就会发生一次荧光破坏过程.

sentences.en: Our assertion that the interstellar gas is definitely no vacuum would seem all the more paradoxical!
sentences.cn: 我们坚持星际气体决非真空的主张看来愈发荒谬可笑了!

sentences.en: Stars are born from a kind of primal soup known as the interstellar medium.
sentences.cn: 恒星是由一种称为星际介质的“原汤”形成的.

sentences.en: Such tumultuous, often visually spectacular, interstellar regions surrounding youthful stars are known as gaseous nebulae.
sentences.cn: 这种环绕着年轻星的动荡且常常是壮观的星际区域,叫做气体星云.

sentences.en: The real problem of interstellar communication does not concern technology.
sentences.cn: 星际通信的实际问题不在于技术.

sentences.en: These elements become part of the interstellar gas and dust.
sentences.cn: 这些元素成了星际气体和星际尘埃的一部分.

sentences.en: These particles constitute the cores of the interstellar dust grains that may be coated with ice.
sentences.cn: 这些粒子构成了星际尘埃颗粒的核子,这些尘埃颗粒的外面也许覆盖一层冰.

sentences.en: Thick clouds of interstellar gas absorb most of the light and screen other stars from us.
sentences.cn: 恒星间气体所形成的厚云层,吸收大部分的光,并遮住其他星星.

sentences.en: We can rule out interstellar rockets, because they are far too slow.
sentences.cn: 我们可以把星际火箭除去, 因为它们太慢了.

sentences.en: We will be interested in the heat capacity of interstellar gases.
sentences.cn: 我们感兴趣的是星际气体的热容量.

sentences.en: Which kind of signal is most promising for interstellar contact?
sentences.cn: 在星际通讯中,选用哪种信号最有效 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: happening or existing between the stars
